attributes.action: Apply a tax rate of 50% on earnings over £80,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How could anyone earning over £80,000 per annum object to making this extra contribution towards making Britain a better place to live. The Government should be trying to ease the burden of tax on the average working person as the gap between the very rich and the rest of us gets greater.
